content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction site at position (y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y1) and a furnace (position y2)
- Burner mining drill (position y3) and a furnace (position y4)

### Iron plate factory at position (z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1) for crafting iron sticks
- Assembling machine (position z2) for crafting iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine at position (z1)
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position (x) to assembling machine at position (z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plate is required for crafting iron-gear-wheel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when attempting to craft without the necessary machines
- Verify that the required crafting machines or furnaces are available and operational before attempting to craft items.
